node.data: {"degree":"Computer Systems Engineer","btn_lang":"Language","soft_skills":"Teamwork, Responsibility, Patience, and Perseverance","contact_info":{"header":"Contact information","address":"Address","phone":"Phone","email":"Email"},"education":{"header":"Educational Background","higher_education":{"title":"Higher Education","college":"Computer Systems Engineering Degree, Evangelical University of El Salvador (2017-2022)","technician":"Technical Systems Engineering Degree, ITCA-FEPADE (2014-2016)"},"high_school":{"title":"High School","school":"High School Diploma, ITEXSAL (2012-2013)"}},"experience":{"header":"Professional Experience","experience_list":[{"experience":"PHP Developer, Infotech (August 2025 - Present)","details":"I was assigned to the Directorate of Information Technologies at MINED, where I participated in the development and maintenance of multiple internal systems, including the Human Resources platform, the corporate clinic system, and the notices and complaints system. During this period, I developed APIs to enable communication between internal systems, using native PHP and adhering to the organization’s internal architecture and standards."},{"experience":"Web Developer, Carnaval (June 2024 - January 2025)","details":"I had the opportunity to participate in the development of an integrated system that covered multiple functionalities specific to each area of the company. The system was structured into internal modules, with distinct roles and permissions for each section, ensuring efficient and secure resource management. We used PHP and Laravel on the backend to ensure optimal performance and a scalable architecture, while on the frontend we implemented React and PrimeReact, which allowed us to create a modern, intuitive, and highly functional user interface. This resulted in a smooth and efficient user experience for all involved."},{"experience":"Web Developer, Trez Labs (March 2021 - October 2023)","details":"Collaborated in the development of web applications using Laravel for the backend and Vue.js for the frontend. I also worked on projects involving React.js and Nuxt.js. Additionally, I had the opportunity to work with WordPress, addressing issues and updating system versions and utilized plugins."},{"experience":"PHP Programmer Intern, World Food Program (June 2019 - November 2019)","details":"I was selected for a 5-month university internship with the World Food Programme, where an inventory control system was developed for one of its warehouses. The PHP and Laravel stack was used to carry out the project."},{"experience":"Web Developer and CRM Administrator, El Salvador Sostenible (November 2015 - February 2016)","details":"I carried out my professional internship at the company El Salvador Sostenible, where I was involved in migrating the website to a more modern version. Additionally, I implemented a small administration panel for the news section of the website. This project was developed using PHP. I also had the opportunity to work with the Sales Up CRM to track company clients."}]},"skills":{"header":"Technical Skills","skills_list":"Programing languages: PHP, Java, Python, JavaScript.Database: MySql, SQL Server.Web Development: HTML, CSS.Frameworks: Laravel, Livewire, Inertia, Vue js, React js, Bootstrap, Tailwind, JQuery.Development tools: Git, GitHub,Visual Studio Code, Jira, Trello.English: Intermediate level"},"others":{"header":"Other Skills","diplomas":"Diplomas","diplomas_items":{"maintenance":"IT Essentials Cisco Networking Academy®, Agosto 2014.","networking":"CCNA Switching & Routing: Introduction to networking Cisco Networking Academy®, Agosto 2015."}},"references":{"header":"References","ref1":{"name":"Manuel Chacón","position":"Web Developer, MINSAL, Tel. 7649-8086"},"ref2":{"name":"Dennys Madrid","position":"Infrastructure and Cloud Engineer, Lifemiles, tel. 7867-6968"}}}
